metadata.title: Wednseday, 19th March, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a police station in Munyumbwe area in Gwembe District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is;
(d) whether the land for the project has been secured; and
(e) if so, where the land is located.
(a) why grants to schools in Chadiza District are released late;
(b) what measures are being taken to ensure that the grants are released on time; and
(c) when the Government will increase grants to schools which are under-funded.
